meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0003.1 ::date 2012-12-10T08:42:50 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt At first , I signed up for a blog on DONEWS , thinking that it was a site for IT professionals where I could perhaps find friends more easily . # ::save-date Thu Oct 26, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0003_1.txt
sentence: At first , I signed up for a blog on DONEWS , thinking that it was a site for IT professionals where I could perhaps find friends more easily .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0003.2 ::date 2012-12-10T09:12:35 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Later , I signed up for another one on MSN , feeling that writing on MSN might make it easier for me to communicate directly with my MSN pals . # ::save-date Thu Oct 26, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0003_2.txt
sentence: Later , I signed up for another one on MSN , feeling that writing on MSN might make it easier for me to communicate directly with my MSN pals .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0003.3 ::date 2012-12-10T09:33:30 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt But gradually , I discovered that both sites were not very good . # ::save-date Mon Dec 7, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0003_3.txt
sentence: But gradually , I discovered that both sites were not very good .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0003.4 ::date 2012-12-10T09:38:25 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt At that time , DONEWS did not have the function of tallying traffic statistics ( I have the habit of looking at the statistics of everything ) ; and even though MSN had that function , others needed to sign on to MSN before they could reply , this meant that after reading the entries , many could not reply even if they wanted to , hence largely reducing the interactive element . # ::save-date Fri Mar 13, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0003_4.txt
sentence: At that time , DONEWS did not have the function of tallying traffic statistics ( I have the habit of looking at the statistics of everything ) ; and even though MSN had that function , others needed to sign on to MSN before they could reply , this meant that after reading the entries , many could not reply even if they wanted to , hence largely reducing the interactive element .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0003.5 ::date 2012-12-10T09:38:56 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The enthusiasm with writing the blog at the beginning was short - lived ; after writing a few original articles for promotion , I did not continue anymore . # ::save-date Mon Nov 2, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0003_5.txt
sentence: The enthusiasm with writing the blog at the beginning was short - lived ; after writing a few original articles for promotion , I did not continue anymore .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0003.6 ::date 2012-12-10T09:58:31 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt At that time , I did n't think about posting articles from other sites as I felt that there was no need to post any articles if I could not come up with anything original ; this meant that sometimes for over two months I did n't even update a new entry . # ::save-date Fri Feb 5, 2016 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0003_6.txt
sentence: At that time , I did n't think about posting articles from other sites as I felt that there was no need to post any articles if I could not come up with anything original ; this meant that sometimes for over two months I did n't even update a new entry .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0003.7 ::date 2012-12-10T10:17:27 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Later , there were also some minor problems with both MSN and DONEWS , so I became more unwilling to post new articles . # ::save-date Mon Nov 13, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0003_7.txt
sentence: Later , there were also some minor problems with both MSN and DONEWS , so I became more unwilling to post new articles .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0003.8 ::date 2012-12-10T10:17:35 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt So , these two blogs have not really been very popular , either # ::save-date Thu Oct 8, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0003_8.txt
sentence: So , these two blogs have not really been very popular , either
